Function Documentation

std::auto_ptr< DataBuffer > createPNGFromSVG (  const MC2String &  filename,
int32  width,
int32  height
) 
 

Creates a PNG image with specified size from a SVG.

Setting size to negative value means that the default size of the svg will be used.

Parameters:
filename Load SVG from this file.
width Width in pixels for the return image.
height Height in pixels for the return image.
Returns:
Allocated buffer that contains a PNG file
